templeDesc: Let NinaWitch guide you through the enigmatic halls of destiny, where past, present, and future converge.
manifestoP1: Not every magical candle should be lit by ordinary hands. Certain rituals—if not performed at the right time and in the right way—can lose their direction or vanish midway.
manifestoP2:
Therefore, for every ritual you entrust, NiNa will be the one to light the candles, draw circles, craft sigils, recite incantations, call forth names, and close the gates upon completion.
You don't need to do anything except to sincerely believe and trust that these rituals already exist in your life.
manifestoP3: You don’t need to strain yourself learning how to "do it right."
manifestoP4: All you need is to be present—in trust and quietness.
manifestoP6: I am the keeper of the flame. I stand between you and the universe. Each ritual I perform on your behalf will be conducted with reverence—sacredness—and absolute privacy.
scrollHint:
Scroll down to immerse
yourself in the world of magic.
recommendDesc: Since NiNa's products are highly diverse, please contact NiNa directly via Facebook for free consultation and to choose the most suitable product for your story or energy
changeLifeTitle:
how do you want to change your
life?
changeLifeDesc: You hold the power to transform and shape your reality through rituals. Discover how with our handcrafted Magic Candles, each individually blessed for your journey
changeLifeDetail: Nina is an experienced practitioner (~15 years), guiding individuals on their spiritual journey, helping them discover their inner power and confront their own shadows. If you do not see a specific service listed, please send me a message via Facebook/Instagram: "Akita Tarot & Healer" to discuss the possibility of scheduling a consultation based on your request.
changeLifeRole:
Alchemist - Occultist - Mage
The importance of knowing thyself is crucial to
activating your power.
changeLifeMedium: I provide Medium readings, including intuitive readings, seer readings, and candle, flower, or other divination methods. I connect with all elements from the spirit world to the physical world to help expand awareness and understanding.
gratitudeTitle:
Words of gratitude
from everyone to Nina
gratitudeDesc:
Experiences visit our Facebook page
to read feedback and see the magic unfold
mysterySubtitle:
We must DO in order to BE, create your
ART, be the Magic!⁣
mysteryP1: The word ART when reversed, or read after the manner of sacred characters from right to left, gives three initials which express the different division of the Great Work. T signifies triad, theory and travail; R, realization; A, adaptation. Art is CREATION.⁣
mysteryP2: Begins with the knowledge of one's self, so is one's own creation first of all works; it comprehends the others and is the beginning of the Great Work. Knowing Thyself is the toughest aspect of Magic, and the one which forces us to evolve.⁣
mysteryP3: When it comes to Magic, to creation your own reality, to ascending, to anything we want to achieve, THE VISIBLE is the manifestation of THE INVISIBLE, or, in other terms, the world, the way we see it, bears an exact proportion to the things which are inappreciable by our senses and unseen by our eyes.⁣
mysteryP4: When it comes to Magic, to creation your own reality, to ascending, to anything we want to achieve, The Visible is the manifestation of The Invisible, or, in other terms, the world, the way we see it, bears an exact proportion to the things which are inappreciable by our senses and unseen by our eyes.⁣
mysteryP5: Magic is unwritten science, which represents the idea of learning by intuition. We must be prodigal in seeking things out, have faith in ourselves like no one else and keep going where others failed. ⁣
mysteryP6: We must pursue our dreams with an untamed force of love, be happy for no reason, don’t be scared to make mistakes, and dare to be different, be yourself.⁣
